overview: Kirk Fleischer is responsible for our strategic initiatives, including acquisitions, as well as our financing strategy. Kirk has over 22 years of executive level management experience having served as an investment banker at several firms, including, most recently, Jefferies & Company, Inc., where he was responsible for running their business services investment banking practice. In addition, Kirk has worked at various other firms including Lehman Brothers and CIBC World Markets. Kirk began his career as a Manager of Corporate Development at Dun & Bradstreet. Kirk holds a Masters in Business Administration - Finance & Accounting from Cornell University, Johnson Graduate School of Business and Bachelor of Arts Degree from Middlebury College in Middlebury, Vermont.
